title: Privacy Policy for Now App
sectionContent: Now App ('we,' 'us,' or 'our') is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard user data in our Now App.
Now App does not collect any personal information from users.

All information is stored on the user's device using SwiftData available in iOS devices. We do not store any personal information outside the user's device.

Cookies and Similar Technologies:
Now uses Google Analytics to improve the in-app experiance
User data stored on the device is protected using the security features of SwiftData.
Now access services provided by FriscoISD and HAC and do not retain information on external servers.
Starting in v4.0.5, Now will use Google Analytics to improve your experiance. The data is in no way shape or form linked to you and is entirely anonymous.
User data is retained on the device until the user logs out or deletes the app.
Users have the right to access and delete their data from their device.

For privacy concerns or data-related requests, users can contact us at nowbffapp@gmail.com.
Changes to the Privacy Policy:
We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices. Users will be notified of any significant changes.
Please review this Privacy Policy carefully. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us at nowbffapp@gmail.com
